channel.title: Homemade PVC instrument performing a medley of recognisable songs
channel.description:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0D2o8F2MOuI#[/url]
It's quite cool, it's a PVC instrument he made himself with help from his father, and he is playing the tunes from songs on it. Ranging from Mario Bro. Theme to Like A Virgin, from Bad Romance to The Final Countdown.
What do you guys think?

item.title: Homemade PVC instrument performing a medley of recognisable songs
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
How I read the title:

Homemade PCV

I am dissapoint. However, this is pretty cool. Not as cool as a working Powered Combat Vest, but cool.

Read full topic

Theevilpplz:

If you read the description, you will see he was inspired by the Blue Man Group, in fact he wants to be one.

small wonder.
The message was that this stuff is nothing new.

item.title: Homemade PVC instrument performing a medley of recognisable songs
item.dc:creator: rtanger
item.description:
Siggs:

I saw this last week. Simple, yet so effective…

But if we’re on that subject, I prefer Hang Drums. SO simple, SO effective…

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TQXn5ba0aT8

Someone noted this song in the comments which happens to be on a fave album of mine, and I like it quite a lot. I swear now that they used that instrument (skip to 1.30 if you must) in that song. Pretty cool.

Also, that PVC instrument in OP is pretty cool. I haven’t seen that vid before. I like it!

Read full topic
